Please grant us the camera usage so that you can take pictures of the surfspot which will be published on my website and mobile app.
Please grant us the access to your gps to show information tailored to your location

Please grant us the access to your gps to show information tailored to your location, pictures from surf spots and forecasts. Additionally pictures that you take of the wave conditions will be localized and forecast infromation will be added to your post.
